title: slotegrator

title: thegalleria
moto: The perfect place to shop, dine and discover

description.content: The Galleria on Al Maryah Island is a luxury shopping and dining destination in Abu Dhabi with over 130 options. The shopping centre features a prestigious mix of iconic luxury fashion and fine jewelry brands as well as specialty retailers alongside international contemporary brands. The Galleria also has an exciting range of dining options including, fine dining, casual restaurants and cafes.

Watch1010 is rooted in its digital portal – an innovative website combining editorial material with a dedicated e-commerce platform. This digital offering is supported by robust social media channels, interactive events and a print magazine published around the most important dates on the industry calendar.

Established in the UK in 1961, Natco is a leading brand for lentils, spices, nuts, poppadoms, gram flour, and much more. Our products are stocked by retailers throughout the UK, Europe and further afield. We support manufacturers with own-label packing and the supply of bulk ingredients. We are an integral part of a worldwide company, Choithrams, ensuring local and global expertise.
